alert.note: Alert for Culebra (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued October 29 at 4:00PM ADT until October 29 at 7:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Culebra County in Puerto Rico... * Until 600 PM AST. * At 300 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen, and additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible. Flash flooding is already occurring or expected to begin shortly. Expect many local roads affected by excessive runoff, including PR-250. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar and broadcast media. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
